metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3826 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description: Heap/stack buffer overflow in the dlang_lname function in d-demangle.c in libiberty allows attackers to potentially cause a denial of service (segmentation fault and crash) via a crafted mangled symbol.

notes.Note: sbeattie> gcc-3.3 only provides libstdc++5 eslerm> vulnerable function added 2020-05-14 with 3f30a27

criterions.comment: gcc-10 package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
